---
id: schedules-the-processing-of-uploaded-employees-and-teams
title: "Schedules the processing of uploaded employees and teams"
description: "Schedules the immediate processing of employees and teams uploaded through the indexing API. By default all uploaded people data will be processed asynchronously but this API can be used to schedule its processing on demand."
sidebar_label: "Schedules the processing of uploaded employees and teams"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Schedules the processing of uploaded employees and teams"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/processallemployeesandteams"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Schedules the immediate processing of employees and teams uploaded through the indexing API. By default all uploaded people data will be processed asynchronously but this API can be used to schedule its processing on demand.


<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

</StatusCodes>
